message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer, so I'll offer you the product for $90.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
I'm still not willing to go below $95, Bob. I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer you the product for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $91.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
